mapper.sql: SELECT X.report_no, X.report_category, X.report_content, X.respondent_no , R.trade_no, U.user_no, U.user_nick, R.trade_title, X.report_date, X.report_status FROM ztrade_report X INNER JOIN ztrade R ON X.trade_no = R.trade_no INNER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no = R.user_no
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ztrade_report WHERE trade_no = #{tradeNo } AND report_status = 'y'
SELECT count(*) FROM ztrade_report WHERE trade_no = #{tradeNo } AND report_status = 'n'

SELECT t.user_no, t.trade_no, t.trade_title, t.trade_content, t.trade_category , f.file_stored, u.user_nick, X.report_category, X.report_content , w.grade_url, t.trade_date, t.trade_hit, ( SELECT count(trade_com_no) FROM ztrade_comment WHERE trade_no = #{tradeNo } ) trade_com_count FROM ztrade t, zuser u, zfile f, USERWITHURL w, ztrade_report X WHERE 1=1 AND t.user_no = u.user_no (+) AND t.file_no = f.file_no (+) AND t.user_no = w.user_no AND t.trade_no = x.trade_no (+)
AND t.trade_no = #{tradeNo }

SELECT u.user_nick, c.user_no, c.trade_com_no, c.trade_no, c.trade_com_content, c.trade_com_date, c.trade_com_secret, w.grade_url FROM ztrade_comment c, zuser u, USERWITHURL w WHERE 1=1 AND u.user_no(+) = c.user_no AND w.user_no(+) = u.user_no AND trade_no = #{tradeNo } ORDER BY trade_com_date
